subject: Bank International - with in
body:
Bank International - with investments in 100 countries
Attention: 
During the task of getting a clean account record of the bank's total asset for year 2023, Barclays came across "DIGITAL money" that has been kept away for few years. The amount is $5 Million USD with your name as intended - recipient, we assume it is money that was accrued to you but was not processed.
It is now end of the year when we need to either move foreign assets to owners like you who are across the border OR forward them to UK Financial Conduct Authority ( FCA - /www.fca.org.uk ) as "FAILED TRANSACTIONS." Barclays can not claim ownership of money that belongs to individuals or companies, hence this email notification.
Barclays has been moving out money belonging to foreign beneficiaries to prevent UK Financial Conduct Authority from taking ownership of the funds this November, 2023.
If you have interest in claiming the 5 Million USD this month, please follow instructions below:
To proceed with the task of making the Digital money available to you so it can be forwarded to any country of your choice, endeavor to send £400 British Pounds for liquidation and BOND removal. This is the method of converting the digital money to real cash that can be spent in any way you want. In addition, furnish us with bank account details of where you wish to receive the $5, 000, 000 USD.
USE MONEYGRAM  (400 Pounds)
Amount to send: £400 British Pounds
Recipient's name: M. A.
Address:  
City: London
Zipcode: E14 5RB
Country: UK
 
After you must have sent it, forward the following information to us: Sender's name, Country and reference number.
==============================
USE BARCLAYS BANK ACCOUNT ( 550 British Pounds) - 400 + 150 tax on corporate account
AMOUNT TO SEND: £550 British Pounds
Bank name: Barclays Bank
Account name: B. C.
IBAN: GB47BUKB20246423XXXXXX
Swiftcode: BUKBGB22
Bank address:  London E14 5HP UK
HERE IS STATEMENT OF THE SECRET TRUST ACCOUNT WHERE THE DIGITAL MONEY IS:
________________________________________
Miss Angela l Assistant Officer
+44 160.397.6138

subject: Re:   Bank International - with in
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I must say, it sounds quite intriguing. I would like to learn more about this opportunity to claim the Million USD that has been kept away for a few years.

Could you please provide me with some additional details? How exactly did my name come up as the intended recipient of this money? And why was it not processed earlier?

Also, I'm curious about the process of converting the digital money into real cash. Could you explain how the BOND removal works and what steps are involved in making the funds available for transfer to any country of my choice?

Lastly, before I proceed, could you clarify why I need to send British Pounds for the BOND removal? Is there a specific reason behind using MoneyGram for this transaction?

I appreciate your assistance in providing these details so that we can move forward with claiming the funds. Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Bank International - with in
body:
Thank you for the mail. Show us the email that we sent to you in this
regard for identity authentication.

subject: Re: Bank International - with in
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm sorry, but I don't recall receiving any previous email from you regarding this matter. Could you please provide more details or forward the email to jog my memory? I want to make sure we have the correct information.

Looking forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Bank International - with in
body:
Hello! How are you today? I hope you're doing well. I wanted to share some interesting information with you. Have you ever heard about a unique investment opportunity that guarantees high returns with minimal risk? It's called the "Double Your Money" program.

This program works by investing your money in various markets and industries, ensuring a steady growth of your initial investment. The best part is that it's completely risk-free! You can double your money within just a few weeks without any effort on your part.

Wouldn't it be great to have some extra cash without having to work for it? Imagine all the things you could do with that money! What do you think about this opportunity?

Best wishes,
David
